entries.name: headers
entries.description: include headers and authorization in the request

entries.name: response
entries.description: Pre-initialized object which becomes response JSON, no need for .data

entries.name: method
entries.description: default="GET" The HTTP method to use

entries.name: cache
entries.description: default=false Whether to cache the request and from frontend cache

entries.name: cacheForTime
entries.description: default=60 Seconds to consider data stale and invalidate cache

entries.name: timeout
entries.description: default=30 The timeout for the request in seconds

entries.name: baseURL
entries.description: default='/api/' base url prefix, override with SERVER_API_URL env

entries.name: cancelOngoingIfNew
entries.description: default=true Cancel previous requests to same path

entries.name: cancelNewIfOngoing
entries.description: default=false Cancel if a request to path is in progress

entries.name: rateLimit
entries.description: default=false If set, how many seconds to wait between requests

entries.name: debug
entries.description: default=false Whether to log the request and response

entries.name: infiniteScroll
entries.description: default=null [page key, response field to concatenate, element with results]

entries.name: setDefaults
entries.description: default=false Pass this with options to set those options as defaults for all requests

entries.name: retryAttempts
entries.description: default=0 Retry failed requests this many times

entries.name: logger
entries.description: default=log Custom logger to override the built-in color JSON log()

entries.name: onRequest
entries.description: Set with defaults to modify each request data. Takes and returns in order: path, response, params, fetchParams

entries.name: onResponse
entries.description: Set with defaults to modify each request data. Takes and returns in order: path, response, params, fetchParams

entries.name: onError
entries.description: Set with defaults to modify each request data. Takes and returns in order: error, path, params

entries.name: onStream
entries.description: Set with defaults to process the response as a stream (i.e., for instant unzip)

entries.name: repeat
entries.description: default=0 Repeat request this many times

entries.name: repeatEvery
entries.description: default=null Repeat request every seconds

entries.name: debounce
entries.description: default=0 Seconds to debounce request, wait to execute so that other requests may override

entries.name: regrabOnStale
entries.description: default=false Refetch when cache is past cacheForTime

entries.name: regrabOnFocus
entries.description: default=false Refetch on window refocus

entries.name: regrabOnNetwork
entries.description: default=false Refetch on network change

entries.name: post
entries.description: shortcut for method: "POST"

entries.name: put
entries.description: shortcut for method: "PUT"

entries.name: patch
entries.description: shortcut for method: "PATCH"

entries.name: body
entries.description: default=null The body of the POST/PUT/PATCH request (can be passed into main)
